sourcesContent:
<template>

    <el-aside :style="{ width: asideWidth + 'px' }" style="overflow: hidden;" class="aside">
        <el-radio-group v-model="isCollapse" style="margin-bottom: 10px;width: 70px; overflow: hidden;">
            <el-radio-button @click="open" v-show="isCollapse" :value="false">
                <el-icon>
                    <Open />
                </el-icon>
            </el-radio-button>
            <el-radio-button @click="close" v-show="!isCollapse" :value="true">
                <el-icon>
                    <TurnOff />
                </el-icon>
            </el-radio-button>
        </el-radio-group>
        <el-menu default-active="2" class="el-menu-vertical-demo" :collapse="isCollapse" @open="open" @close="close"
            :collapse-transition='false' style="width: 100%;height: 100%;border:0;" v-for="item in routes"
            :key="item.id">
            <router-link :to="item.to">
                <el-menu-item :index="key">
                    <el-icon>
                        <!-- <UserFilled /> -->
                        <component :is="item.icon" />
                    </el-icon>
                    <template #title>item.name</template>
                </el-menu-item>
            </router-link>
        </el-menu>
    </el-aside>
</template>
<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'
let isCollapse = ref(true);
let asideWidth = ref(70);
const routes = [
    {
        id: 1,
        to: '/home',
        icon:'UserFilled',
        name:'个人主页'
    }
]
function close() {
    // isCollapse = false;
    asideWidth.value = 70;
    console.log(asideWidth)
}
function open() {
    // isCollapse = true;
    asideWidth.value = 200
    console.log(asideWidth)
}
</script>
<style>
.aside {
    /* background-color: #a1a3a6; */
}

.el-menu-vertical-demo:not(.el-menu--collapse) {
    width: 260px;
    height: 100%;
}
</style>
